subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Trojans rallied from a 15-point halftime deficit to beat Arizona State and win the Pacific-10 Conference title, earning an automatic bid to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The Trojans rallied from a 15-point halftime deficit to beat Arizona State and win the Pacific-10 Conference title, earning an automatic bid to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
